Yego Coffee Website

A react website with a shopify integration via a separate subdomain for a coffee retailer based in Boston.

Live Preview Github Repo

Yego Coffee needed help rebranding their Boston-based genuine Rwandan coffee retail and wholesale website.

It was important that Yego Coffee have a central location to promote both green and roasted coffee, without losing their current clientele base.

In order to set him up for increased integration with Shopify and ShipStation, I used a react website for his front end and then added in a subdomain for the shop and account management.
